about.title: About Me
about.specialization: Full-stack developer and junior machine learning engineer.
about.introduction: I specialize in creating intuitive and functional digital experiences, both in front-end, back-end, and systems that apply machine learning. With a solid understanding of database management. My passion for technology drives me to constantly learn and refine my skills to face new challenges in system development.

projects.title: Projects
projects.title-p1: Change Detection and Classification in Images
projects.description-p1: Change detection in bitemporal satellite images with deep learning. Deep neural networks BAN, ResNet, and a visualizer system with Streamlit.io. ⁙⁙ Python, TensorFlow, Streamlit.io, Open-CD ⁙⁙
projects.description-p2: Deployed portfolio presentation. Showcasing personal data, projects, experience, and contact information. ⁙⁙ Astro, HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS ⁙⁙
projects.description-p3: Retraining Google's NLP BERT model for the task of classifying phrases into positive, neutral, and negative sentiments. ⁙⁙ Python, TensorFlow, Streamlit ⁙⁙
projects.description-p4: Face detection and identification in images and videos, displaying the name of the trained person in the model. Tracking used a pre-trained Yolo-v3 model to detect people and enclose them in a rectangle in both images and live video. ⁙⁙ Python, Flask, CSS ⁙⁙
projects.title-p5: Website for Publishing and Scheduling Services
projects.description-p5: The website allows users to register, create, and search for services offered by other users. It also enables contacting and setting a remuneration, place, and time for the service. ⁙⁙ HTML, CSS, SCSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, Spring Boot, Java, Postgresql ⁙⁙
projects.title-p6: Mobile Application for Patient Tracking and Management
projects.description-p6: Mobile application for both Android and iOS aimed at doctors. It allowed the creation of reminders and patient tracking with scheduled therapies. ⁙⁙ Flutter, Spring Boot ⁙⁙

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: Development, maintenance, and deployment of a website for credit unions across the country (Argus Risk).
experience.frameworks: <0> <1>Frameworks used:</1> Front-end: Angular with PrimeAngular; Back-end: Spring Boot; Calculation process: Flask, Database: Postgresql databases both locally and on AWS cloud. </0>
